name: SpookyTales
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spooky tales
des:
Spooky tales lets you listen to a quick horror tale. Some of these will make you think and some others can cause nightmares. So be prepared for the scares!

How To Use
The skill is really easy to use. Just say "Alexa, open Spooky Tales." 
You will be asked if you'd like to listen to more tales after she tells you one. 
You can answer either with a "Yes" or a "No."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
